scripts.db:migrate:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production --config config/config.js
scripts.db:migrate:undo:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo --env production --config config/config.js
scripts.db:migrate:undo:all:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo:all --env production --config config/config.js
scripts.db:seed:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed:all --env production --config config/config.js
scripts.db:seed:undo:prod: dotenv -e .env.production -- npx sequelize-cli db:seed:undo:all --env production --config config/config.js
